price: (Nkͻmhyεni), sε wonya suro wͻ amanfoͻ bi ho sε wͻbɛdi wo hwammͻ a, to (wͻn apam no) san ma wͻn (wͻ nhyehyεε) pa so, efirisε Nyankopͻn mpε wͻn a wͻdi hwammͻ no asεm.
arabic: وَإِمَّا تَخَافَنَّ مِن قَوۡمٍ خِيَانَةٗ فَٱنۢبِذۡ إِلَيۡهِمۡ عَلَىٰ سَوَآءٍۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡخَآئِنِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-immā takhāfanna min qawmin khiyānatan fa-inbidh ilayhim ʿalā sawāin inna al-laha lā yuḥibbu al-khāinīna
